titleStmt.title: The forme and maner of examination befoir the admission to ye tabill of ye Lord, vsit be ye ministerie of Edinburgh and geuin to ye maisteris of euerie familie not be ye oft reiding yairof yai may be ye better instructit in ye groundis [and] principall heidis of religion.
titleStmt.author: Church of Scotland. Presbytery of Edinburgh.

notesStmt.note: At foot of title: Cum priuilegio Regali.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
